channel.title: How do i change a certain characters lvls or hitpoints
channel.description: will anyone show me how to do it because on this old server i used to play on the owner changed her hitpoints to 999/999

item.title: How do i change a certain characters lvls or hitpoints
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Go to your Character folder and open the acc you want to change
scroll down a little and you should see this:

[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 161 498926000 character-skill = 1 161 486000000 character-skill = 2 161 492499000 character-skill = 3 135 517215184 character-skill = 4 135 486000000 character-skill = 5 71 486000000 character-skill = 6 135 488764708 character-skill = 7 135 486000000 character-skill = 8 135 486000000 character-skill = 9 135 486000030 character-skill = 10 135 486000000 character-skill = 11 135 486000000 character-skill = 12 135 486000000 character-skill = 13 135 486002310 character-skill = 14 135 486000000 character-skill = 15 135 486012010 character-skill = 16 135 486000000 character-skill = 17 135 486000000 character-skill = 18 135 494100000 character-skill = 19 135 486000000 character-skill = 20 135 486000000 character-skill = 21 135 486000000 character-skill = 22 135 486000000 character-skill = 23 135 486000000 character-skill = 24 135 486000000

Just edit and you are done
